title: Angular momentum - torque angular momentum graph

content.question: The graph shows the angular momentum <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math> of a rigid system as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>. Which of the following statements about the torque exerted on the system is supported by the graph?

choices.label: The torque decreases in magnitude and is in the same direction as the angular momentum.
The torque decreases in magnitude and is in the opposite direction of the angular momentum.
The torque increases in magnitude and is in the same direction as the angular momentum.
The torque increases in magnitude and is in the opposite direction of the angular momentum.

content.answer: The torque increases in magnitude and is in the opposite direction of the angular momentum.

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
